department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch: 期望透過此門課程所教授之內容幫助同學對計算機網路有更深層的認識，並了解計算機網路的應用
goal.en:
"In this course students will have knowledge about technologies of computer networking 
and understand various applications of computer networks."

outline.ch:
(1) Computer Networks and the Internet
(2) Application Layer
(3) Transport Layer
(4) The Network Layer
(5) The Link Layer and Local Area Networks
outline.en:
(1) Computer Networks and the Internet
(2) Application Layer
(3) Transport Layer
(4) The Network Layer
(5) The Link Layer and Local Area Networks

textbook.ch: "J. F. Kurose and K. W. Ross, “Computer Networking,” 3rd Edition, Addison Wesley."
textbook.en: "J. F. Kurose and K. W. Ross, “Computer Networking,” 3rd Edition, Addison Wesley."

gradMethod.ch:
出席  15%
作業 35%
期中考 25%
期末考 25%

domain.ch: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群
domain.en: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群

ch.competencies: 分析及處理問題的能力
溝通協調與團隊合作能力
國際視野與終身學習的能力。

en.competencies: System Analysis and Solve the Problem

ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系。年級:限三年級。班別:限A。
系所:限資訊工程學系。年級:限四年級。
系所:限輔系-資訊工程學系、雙主修-資訊工程學系、第二專長-資訊工程程式設計。
系所:限資訊電機學院學士班。
en: Department:Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.Year:Third Year only.Class:A only.
Department:Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.Year:Fourth Year only.
Department:Minor-Computer Science and Information Engineering、Double Major-Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、Minor Specialty-Programming design in computer science only.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.
